metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14313 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The shibboleth_login_form function in shibboleth.php in the Shibbolethplugin before 1.8 for WordPress is prone to an XSS vulnerability due toimproper use of add_query_arg().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress-shibboleth - 1.4-2+deb8u1build0.14.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress-shibboleth package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4-2+deb8u1build0.14.04.2').
